Name: Adib Hasan Abd al-Aziz Abu Kharab
Orient claim: Active in al-Nasser Salah al-Din Brigades

Name: Osama Ayoub
Orient note: Worked in the "Special Police" apparatus and then moved to the intervention and order enforcement force
al-Qassam entry: worked in the Special Police Service, and then moved to work in the Public Order Department
Additional notes: Was "accompanied by the martyr Azmi Diab"  Booby-trapped "as many houses and streets as possible"   Killed in a skirmish

Name: Ahmed Hani Ahmad Kano'
Additional notes: Listed on Facebook as a "martyr of the national duty"  Listed as a martyr on shireen.ps - no details  Listed by B'Tselem as one of the 248 "not applicable"

Name: Ahmad Hamed Hasan Abu 'Ita
Orient note: Joined in 2006  Officer in the Hamas police
al-Qassam entry: Worked in "periodic patrolling of the borders"
Additional notes: Injured in an airstrike on the mosque of the martyr "Ibrahim al-Maqadma"   Died in al-Shifa on 01/03/2009  The Qassam soldiers "made a covenant and an oath that they would not return except with victory"

Name: Ahmad Hamdi Yusuf al-Darmili
al-Qassam entry: Died between the Martyrs' Mosque and al-Saraya Security Complex  "accompanied by three other comrades"

Name: Ahmad Talal Muhammad Dadr
Orient note: Active in the engineering unit that deals with the preparation of explosive charges and weapons
al-Qassam entry: Died in the passport office in Arafat City "for the police on duty"

Name: Ahmad Kamal Hamuda al-Dalu
Orient note: Officer in the Hamas al Rimal Police
al-Qassam entry: Worked as an administrator in the Abbas Police Station  Died on guard duty at the border

Name: Ahmad Maher Ahmad Abu Musa
Orient claim: Active in the al-Qassam Brigades (air defence unit and suicide unit)
al-Qassam entry: Died at "work in the intervention and maintenance of order apparatus"
Additional notes: Participated in preparing the defence plan and planting explosive devices

Name: Ahmad Muhammad Ahmad Badawi
al-Qassam entry: Died in raid on the Al-Mashtal site which had been bombed the day before
Additional notes: Born mid-70s, joined al-Qassam Brigades in the Second Intifada, worked in the police with the rank of first lieutenant

Name: Ahmad Muhammad Jamil Balousha
al-Qassam entry: Joined al-Qassam some time after 2005, died launching missiles in the Al-Qassam Artillery Corps
Additional notes: Had apparently worked in the signal room of the Public Security Service and survived a bombing once - they don't say when

Name: Ahmad Muhammad Nafez Abu Hadaid
Orient note: Security mechanism  Active in the anti-tank and suicide units
al-Qassam entry: Killed "working in the main security and protection apparatus affiliated with the Ministry of Interior in Gaza City"  A knight "of the armoured unit" and also a member of the "martyrdom unit"
Additional notes: Names are spelled differently between sites but biographies and birthdays seem to line up (1987 vs 88 - this 1 year discrepancy happens often for some reason)

Name: Ahmad Muhammad Salameh al-Qrainawi
al-Qassam entry: Died "performing his duties in a police station in the middle of the Strip"

Name: Ayman Ahmed Amer al-Kurd (double check translation)
al-Qassam entry: Born 1980  Killed by tank fire whilst monitoring IDF locations in what might have been a civilian house
Additional notes: After high school, he "joined the Palestinian Authority within its defunct security apparatus, and was transferred to the city of Jericho as part of a military course for the General Intelligence Service that lasted about three months"

Name: Ahmad Nasser Ahmad Tabil
Orient note: Born 1981, joined al-Qassam in 2003, made observations, planted explosives, dug tunnels, trained fighters, active in the suicide unit, active in the secret general security apparatus, killed in police HQ
al-Qassam entry: Born 1983, joined al-Qassam in 2003, worked in the "secret General Security agency", died at the site of the "Intervention and Order Preservation Forces"   movements
Additional notes: Participated in digging tunnels, member of the martyrdom unit, repelled incursions, planted bombs, fired shells at vehicles and tanks, monitored enemy movements

Name: Ahmed Salah al-Laham
Orient note: Born 1986, active in al-Qassam, participated in suicide fighters unit, stationed in forward positions, planted explosives, dug tunnels, killed the in police station in Deir al-Balah
al-Qassam entry: Born 1986  Joined al-Qassam ~2006  Killed in "the Palestinian police site west of the city of Deir al-Balah"

Name: Ahmad Abed Hamed al-Hasanat
Orient note: Killed in combat with an IDF force in Deir al-Balah
al-Qassam entry: Died in Deir al-Balah   Worked "as an officer in the traffic and rescue police in the central region"

Name: Ahmad Abd al-Hayy Hasan al-Safadi
al-Qassam entry: Born 1984  "maintained his appointment to guard the borders"   Air defence unit  Died firing missiles
Additional notes: Date of death is off by 2 days

Name: Ahmad Abd al-Latif Hussein Saad al-Din
al-Qassam entry: Joined al-Qassam in 2002  Died working in the Forum building, headquarters of the Security and Protection Service within the Public Relations and Media Department
Additional notes: Listed under "Military Media"  "chosen to work as a representative of the media office in his area, although his work was not without risks or critical situations"

Name: Ahmad Abd al-Majid Hussein Abu Odeh
Orient note: Joined the executive force of the Hamas government in 2007
al-Qassam entry: Lieutenant of the "Executive Force of the Ministry of Interior", died at work in the Madinat al-Zahra police site

Name: Ahmad Abd al-Qader Ibrahim al-Haddad

Name: Ahmad Abdullah Salem al-Khatib

Name: Ahmad Fuad Mahmoud al-Askari

Name: Iyad Adli Ramadan al-Najjar

Name: Ibrahim Mahmoud Ahmad Washah

Name: Ibrahim Abd al-Salam Muhammad Abu al-Rous
